entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Port Carling
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:52 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -10.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 04:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

Visibility: 11.3 km
Humidity: 78 %

Dewpoint: -13.8°C

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Wind becoming north 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
